mapper.select: select u.userID, u.name, sum(i.creater = u.userID) AS creation , sum(i.userID = u.userID) AS recived , sum(i.userID = u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待解决')) AS resolved, sum(i.creater = u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待解决')) AS closed, ifnull( concat( round( sum(i.userID = u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待解决')) / sum(i.userID = u.userID) *100), '%') ,'0%') AS completion from usertable u,issuetable i WHERE u.roleID = 0 GROUP BY u.userID

select (@mycnt := @mycnt + 1) as row , u.userID, u.name, sum(i.creater = u.userID ) AS creation , sum(i.userID = u.userID ) AS recived , sum(i.userID =u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待解决') ) AS resolved , sum(i.creater = u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待解决') )AS closed , ifnull( concat( round( sum(i.userID = u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待解决')) / sum(i.userID = u.userID) *100), '%') ,'0%') AS completion from usertable u,issuetable i
AND u.userID = #{userID}
AND u.name LIKE '%' #{name} '%'
AND u.roleID = 0
GROUP BY u.userID

SELECT issueID,title,creater,createtime,usertable.name,issuestate,plantime,acttime FROM issuetable,usertable WHERE issuetable.userID=usertable.userID AND issuetable.userID=#{userID} ORDER BY createtime DESC

SELECT is1.issueID,is1.title,is1.creater,is1.createtime,usertable.name,is1.issuestate,is1.plantime,is1.acttime FROM (SELECT * FROM issuetable WHERE userID=#{userID}) AS is1,usertable
AND issueID = #{issueID}
AND issuestate LIKE '%' #{issuestate} '%'
AND creater LIKE '%' #{creater} '%'
AND name LIKE '%' #{name} '%'
AND is1.userID=usertable.userID
ORDER BY is1.issueID DESC
